dialogues.speaker: EIGHTH AVENUE --
dialogues.text: Danny trudges up Eighth Avenue, his hands thrust in his pockets, trying to keep warm in the early morning chill. He picks up his pace, until he is no longer walking but running, soaring past sex shops and porno theaters and sl go-go bars whose doors have finally closed. He comes to the subway and bounds down the steps.
